title: Fluffy?
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>You-chan~? Maru tried it on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oooh, that looks nice. Picking this design was the right choice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru really likes this outfit too! It’s cute zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Is it hard to move around in or a bit tight somewhere?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Nope, it’s fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Good, good. But Hanamaru-chan, outfits like this really suits you, huh? Maybe it’s because you have a fluffy aura?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A fluffy aura?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah. You’re always smiling, and just being with you feels so calming. That’s why you look so good in this kind of outfit! ....Hm? What’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru thinks you’re praising me too much zura.... Maru isn’t really like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeeeh, you totally are! Look at me, Hanamaru-chan! I’ll explain it to you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
